summary: syntax highlighing, interaction and help/class def lookup for Supercollider
name: scvim
description:
See http://x37v.info/scvim/ for more details. [and the most up to date version].

Hi, these are my supercollider interaction scripts and syntax highlighting for vim.

It works on both linux and osx.

So far I have:

    * Syntax Highlighting
    * The ability to single lines, visual blocks or supercollider blocks (ie surrounded by parens) to sclang
    * key bindings for s.freeAll, thisProcess.stop() [cmd-. in the SC editor], TempoClock.clear()
    * In-line Help
    * In-line Class Look-up
install_details: see the tar file for install details.

versions.release_notes: Added a Scons installer, changed things up quite a bit.
updated to include html help processing
